last_episode_to_air.name: Showin' Out
last_episode_to_air.overview: Andi's attempt to see Gary is stopped by an indignant Hudson. Tony's surprise for Danni leads to a blow-up between them at work. Robin gives Fatima the worst boss she can imagine. An old rival returns to the bank and accuses Sabrina and Maurice of getting her fired; which brings out a new side of Sabrina. A disgruntled customer threatens Karen's salon.

name: Tyler Perry's Sistas
overview: There's nothing that bonds a group of single black women together more than sidestepping the land mines of living, working and dating in Atlanta. In a sea of swipe-lefts, social media drama and unrealistic #relationshipgoals, these friends try to find their Mr. Right.

episodes.name: The Pilot
episodes.overview: Andi braves the highs and lows of her special day; Karen makes a difficult decision. Sabrina entertains the prospect of new love.

episodes.name: Mixed Signal
episodes.overview: Andi is forced to reconsider who is and isn't in her corner. Karen meets someone new and reconsiders the dating game. Sabrina's new love interest sparks some suspicion. Danni witnesses something that could break Andi's heart.

episodes.name: A Woman With No Soul
episodes.overview: Changes in Andi's situationship leave her reeling. Sabrina's confusion causes her to avoid Calvin altogether. Karen struggles to put the past behind her. Danni discovers more about Zac's struggles without Karen.

episodes.name: New Stories
episodes.overview: Andi's relationship with Gary takes a definitive turn. New information helps shed light on Sabrina's predicament and her fears. Danni extends an olive branch to Zac. Karen finds there's more to Aaron's story than meets the eye.

episodes.name: One Day at a Time
episodes.overview: Andi realizes getting what she wants isn't all it's cracked up to be; Karen resolves not to make the same mistakes as Andi; Sabrina's next venture with Calvin deepens her fears; Danni is worried by how easily Zac sees through her.

episodes.name: No Judgement
episodes.overview: Andi struggles to keep her personal life and job separate; developments in Karen's love life pose new possibilities; Sabrina provides the voice of wisdom to her friends; Danni mulls over her exchange with Zac.

episodes.name: Boy Bye
episodes.overview: Andi acts quickly to help a fallen friend; a misunderstanding leaves Karen in a precarious and heartbreaking situation; Danni starts to address rumors she's caught wind of.

episodes.name: Old Faithful
episodes.overview: Andi is stuck between a rock and a hard place; Danni sets out to find the truth among her friends; Sabrina starts to open up to Calvin; Karen finds herself repeatedly unlucky in love.

episodes.name: Acceptance
episodes.overview: Danni's relationship with an unlikely person develops in an unexpected twist of events. Aaron recruits Andi's help with reaching out to Karen. Sabrina tries to figure out the shift in Karen's attitude.

episodes.name: Revelations
episodes.overview: Andi’s suspicions are raised concerning her lover; Sabrina and Calvin start to make progress, and Danni sets her problems aside in favor of helping Andi.

episodes.name: The Sister Circle
episodes.overview: Danni calls herself helping Karen. Sabrina tries to navigate the waters of friendship despite some clashing personalities. Andi’s greatest secret is revealed.

episodes.name: All I Got
episodes.overview: Gary's secrets are revealed, putting him and Andi at odds once more; the shadow of Aaron's past overwhelms Karen; Danni tries to be there for Zac, uncertain if this new revelation is one he won't recover from.

episodes.name: In Front Of Me
episodes.overview: Karen's world is rocked when blood is on her hands; Sabrina is in for a big surprise with one of Maurice's scheme's; Danni plays middle-man to some troubling news; trouble in paradise causes Andi to make a hard decision.

episodes.name: To be Free
episodes.overview: There’s nothing that bonds a group of single black women together more than sidestepping the land mines of living, working and dating in Atlanta. In a sea of swipe-lefts, social media drama and unrealistic #relationshipgoals, these friends try to find their Mr. Right.

episodes.name: Too Much Glass
episodes.overview: An unexpected visitor makes a compelling argument on Calvin's behalf.

episodes.name: The Firm
episodes.overview: Personal choices threaten to railroad Andi's career forever; Danni helps Zac see a light at the end of the tunnel; Karen learns of Aaron's troubled past.

episodes.name: The Trojan Horse
episodes.overview: Andi discovers that she has many enemies in her personal and professional life; Karen is left to clean up Zac's mess; Sabrina tries to reach out to Calvin; Danni continues to advocate for Zac.

episodes.name: Bugaboo
episodes.overview: Gary swoops in to help Andi in the nick of time; Karen holds firm to her convictions; Sabrina helps Maurice prepare for an exciting event; Danni has to decide her feelings about her new situation.

episodes.name: Give me the Night
episodes.overview: Sabrina becomes an unlikely hero after stumbling upon a terrible incident; Andi fights back; Danni ventures out in an effort to put herself out there again.

episodes.name: A Chance to Love
episodes.overview: Gary's insecurities come to light; Karen and Zac find themselves in a familiar place; Danni finds herself the mediator between friends.

episodes.name: From the Balcony
episodes.overview: The dating game has Danni at a disadvantage when her feelings get the best of her; Andi tries to be strong for Gary; Karen stands strong on her principles; Sabrina opens up in the midst of a tragedy.

episodes.name: The Yellow Dress
episodes.overview: Karen's mom comes to her defense, Sabrina sees a different side of Calvin, Andi receives an important call, and Gary has an unexpected encounter.

episodes.name: Home For A Queen
episodes.overview: The ladies are concerned about Andi and her relationship choice as Andi's patience wears thin; Sabrina stands strong for all of her friends who seem to be under attack.

episodes.name: A Bad Feeling
episodes.overview: Sabrina worries that Andi is blind to Gary's true nature, Zac gets advice from a self-made millionaire, Andi receives unsolicited help, and Karen has a shocking encounter.

episodes.name: The Long Road
episodes.overview: A terrifying encounter threatens Karen's safety; Sabrina shows loyalty to maurice; Danni confronts Preston; Andi learns shocking news about Gary.

episodes.name: The Lonely Road
episodes.overview: Preston presses Danni to let her guard down and be vulnerable with him. Gary believes he is being setup. Andi arrives to her apartment and finds that Gary has possibly wrecked her life.

episodes.name: High Crimes
episodes.overview: Andi is devastated that her privacy has been compromised. Fatima begs a colleague to help Andi with her legal issues. Gary calls Andi and reveals that he believes his ex-wife is framing him.

episodes.name: It's All About Pacing
episodes.overview: Aaron confides in Karen that he has a new plan for his life. Preston surprises Danni with dinner and roses. Sabrina thinks Gary may be telling the truth about his ex-wife setting him up.

episodes.name: Trying to Stay Open
episodes.overview: Fatima and Zac meet each other after an unfortunate accident. Danni gets offended by something Preston says. Andi contemplates a settlement in a legal case.

episodes.name: Up In Flames
episodes.overview: Andi finds success at work, but new problems arise with Gary. Maurice returns to work when he thinks that he is being replaced. Danni wonders if Preston could be racist.

episodes.name: That Look
episodes.overview: Andi tries to move on and consider other men. Calvin needs a place to stay. Danni is angry at Preston. Zac meets someone new.

episodes.name: Complications
episodes.overview: Andi is embarrassed after a night of drinking. Gary is desperate for news about Andi. Danni hears a terrible rumor about Calvin.

episodes.name: Moving On
episodes.overview: Preston is surprised by Danni. Andi wins big after a strategic battle. Zac jeopardizes his new job.

episodes.name: When I Get Home
episodes.overview: Andi is uncomfortable with Gary's latest actions. Sabrina gives Maurice some advice to assist with his new troubles. Zac is confused by aco-worker's advances.

episodes.name: The Encounter
episodes.overview: Olonzo approaches Maurice again. Gary becomes obsessed with reconciling with Andi. Tensions grow as Hayden threatens Zac.

episodes.name: The Hot Stove
episodes.overview: Gary forces a conversation with Andi. Zac is pursued by a new love interest. Later, Gary gets drunk and his anger boils over.

episodes.name: Thinking of You
episodes.overview: Andi believes she is being punished for dating a married man. Calvin and Maurice enter into an agreement. Danni and Sabrina stand infull support of Andi as she attempts to make things right with Gary.

episodes.name: Let It Be
episodes.overview: Sabrina and Danni are fearful as they remember how hard it was to get Andi away from her abusive boyfriend in college. Fatima learns thatHayden has been threatening Zac. Karen confronts Zac while Zac is working at the airport. She causes a scene.

episodes.name: Just For Me
episodes.overview: Zac comes to Danni's defense when she is threatened at work. Fatima and Andi share a heart to heart about their friendship. Karen believes thatZac has betrayed her.

episodes.name: A Tough Decision
episodes.overview: Danni tries to help Preston after his life is threatened. Fatima is ready to pursue a relationship. Karen enacts revenge upon Zac.

episodes.name: Missing What You Never Had
episodes.overview: Zac finds himself in legal trouble. Sabrina considers going on a date with a new guy. Gary puts it all on the line when he expresses his love forAndi.

episodes.name: Addicted
episodes.overview: Zac believes he is being framed. Preston invites a guest to Danni's house without informing her. Andi takes a chance and goes against thewise counsel of her dear friends.

episodes.name: When It's Midnight
episodes.overview: Karen becomes very upset with Andi. Fatima threatens an attorney at the firm. Maurice walks into his home and makes a shocking discovery.

episodes.name: Severing All Ties
episodes.overview: Gary comes to Andi's rescue after she gets herself into a compromising situation. Zac talks seriously to a new woman who values him in away no woman ever has. Sabrina calls Calvin to confront him.

episodes.name: Catch Fade
episodes.overview: Fatima comes to Andi's rescue. Sabrina realizes she made a terrible mistake. Zac confronts Karen about why he could never betray her.

episodes.name: Where The Heart Is
episodes.overview: Karen struggles with her feelings for Zac. Gary reluctantly agrees to get counseling. Fatima senses hidden fears from Zac.

episodes.name: In the Shadows
episodes.overview: Gary and Andi consider taking a big and scary step. Fatima kicks her new love interest out of her house. Sabrina enjoys the company of anew man.

episodes.name: When You're Confused
episodes.overview: The fate of a troubled relationship is at the hands of an ex-partner.

episodes.name: Acting Normal
episodes.overview: Andi finds herself in the middle of Fatima and Karen, who both want Zac.

episodes.name: The Gift of Goodbye
episodes.overview: Zac helps a passenger retrieve an item she left on a plane, and the tip she gives him could be life-changing.

episodes.name: Just a Talk
episodes.overview: Gary decides to surprise And in a way to truly show his love her her, but those close to her are filled with doubt

episodes.name: Being a Boy
episodes.overview: Zac reveals his feelings for Fatima to Karen; Andi and Gary develop a problem in bed.

episodes.name: The Chase
episodes.overview: The men in these relationships are ready for the next level commitments, but the ladies are reluctant

episodes.name: Protecting Myself
episodes.overview: Andi is walking a thin line while trying to keep the peace and stay out of Fatima, Karen and Zac's love triangle.

episodes.name: Little White Lies
episodes.overview: Fatima believes she’s caught Gary in a compromising position and calls Andi to rush home to drop in on him unexpectedly.

episodes.name: Run Tell That
episodes.overview: Zac’s investment pays off in a major way; Danni begins to figure out how to move past her toxic relationship cycles

episodes.name: Unlock It
episodes.overview: And I has a sudden change of heart after another one of Gary’s antics strikes home

episodes.name: The Dollar Store
episodes.overview: Maurice faces a harrowing experience; Aaron is determined to win Karen's heart; Zac wants to include fatima in an important decision.

episodes.name: Water Under the Bridge
episodes.overview: Sabrina and Maurice have a scary encounter at the bank; Calvin delivers a blow Sabrina was not expecting and may not recover from.

episodes.name: One Word Answers
episodes.overview: Sabrina and Maurice have an awkward encounter with Calvin and a guest; Andi faces off with Gary; danni and Preston let their guards down; Karen makes a mistake in the heat of the moment.

episodes.name: Unknown Caller
episodes.overview: Karen urgently tries to get in touch with Zac; Maurice drops some pearls of knowledge on Sabrina; Robin keeps making moves on Andi; Hayden stirs up trouble for Zac and Fatima.

episodes.name: At Seven
episodes.overview: Hayden tries to provoke Zac; Jacobi makes a peace offering to Sabrina; Karen seeks closure; Maurice offers Calvin advice; Gary's therapist crosses the line.

episodes.name: Burning Taboo
episodes.overview: And I calls Robin after having a drink and it leads to Robin’s hotel room.

episodes.name: From A  Woman
episodes.overview: Danni has second thoughts about asking Preston for space when it doesn’t look they way it should

episodes.name: The Wild Card
episodes.overview: Andi has decided she wants to let go and be uninhibited with Robin, but she has no idea just how wild Robin's inhibitions may run.

episodes.name: We Got Time
episodes.overview: Karen confronts Fatima; Maurice agrees to meet Que at the police stationary he turns himself in; Zac and Karen finally have a conversation

episodes.name: Curve Balls
episodes.overview: The aftermath of a slip up causes life altering decisions to be made.

episodes.name: A Woman's Work
episodes.overview: A girls' night out leads to bizarre bedfellows the next morning, Zac struggles with the pressure when Hayden gets on his case, and a revelation drives a wedge between Maurice and Sabrina.

episodes.name: A Brick Wall
episodes.overview: Danni doesn't get the response she expects when she addresses Preston's privilege, Calvin tries to smooth things over between Maurice and Sabrina, and Karen suspects Zac is hiding a secret.

episodes.name: Still Waters Run Deep
episodes.overview: Andi grills Fatima about the attack on Hayden, Sabrina and Calvin set Maurice up on a date to get his mind off Que, and Gary shows up with a major surprise.

episodes.name: Pleasantries
episodes.overview: Danni realizes she's not quite over Preston, Zac comes to Fatima with questions about the parking garage stunt, and an awkward talk during a date leads to problems for Sabrina and Calvin.

episodes.name: The Night Game
episodes.overview: Sabrina rebounds after Calvin's outburst ruins their date, Karen comes across a basketball game that leaves her suspicious, and Danni has an unexpected visitor after a day with El Fuego.

episodes.name: Life, Soul and Heart
episodes.overview: Danni discovers Logan's secret, Calvin tries to smooth things over with Sabrina, a cellphone mix-up turns into an exercise in trust for Zac and Fatima, and Karen confides in Aaron.

episodes.name: Hard to Get
episodes.overview: Karen asks Aaron for space, Gary introduces Zac to a financial adviser, Andi questions Karen's motives for inviting Fatima to their get-together, and Danni and Preston have a heart-to-heart.

episodes.name: Moving On Up
episodes.overview: Andi rejects Gary's attempt to buy her love, but her friends aren't so sure she should turn down his gifts; Karen extends an invite to Fatima; and Aaron and Zac confront each other.

episodes.name: The Sister
episodes.overview: Fatima has a surprising reaction to Karen's revelation, Andi enjoys Gary's extravagant gifts, and Jake's advice to Zac about his shady stock deals comes too late.

episodes.name: Counter Punch
episodes.overview: The police arrest Zac without telling him the charges, Sabrina looks at Bayo differently after seeing his bank account, Aaron tells Karen how he feels, and Andi stands firm against Gary.

episodes.name: Our Favorite Places
episodes.overview: Zac is stunned to learn about the charges being brought against him, Andi asks Danni for advice, Maurice and Calvin argue over what to do about Que, and Sabrina's date is interrupted.

episodes.name: Fine Wine
episodes.overview: Sabrina struggles with her feelings for Bayo when a jealous Calvin interrupts their date, Karen vents to Andi and Danni about prison-bound Zac, and Maurice reluctantly opens his home to Que.

episodes.name: Goodbye at the Door
episodes.overview: Fatima comes out swinging in defense of Zac, Sabrina and Bayo decide to take things slow on their date, and Maurice rebuffs Que’s romantic advances.

episodes.name: Shaking in the Rain
episodes.overview: Andi visits Fatima after her arrest, Sabrina feels pressure to choose a man, and tensions mount as Karen and Aaron wait to find out how far along she is in her pregnancy.

episodes.name: Money Is King
episodes.overview: Karen struggles to process her baby news, Andi puts Hayden in his place when he gloats about sending Fatima to jail, Danni confronts Zac, and Maurice comes home to an unwelcome dinner guest.

episodes.name: We Know Enough
episodes.overview: Zac's temper gets him in trouble, Andi calls in a favor, Maurice sets ground rules for Que, Karen has a heart-to-heart with Aaron, and Sabrina learns a startling fact about Bayo.

episodes.name: Look Closely
episodes.overview: Fatima is desperate to get Zac out of jail, Andi takes steps to protect herself from Gary, Robin tricks Hayden with a convincing fib, and Que surprises Calvin with his views on sexuality.

episodes.name: Some Sort Of Woman
episodes.overview: Aaron struggles with Karen's commitment level, Andi and Robin's relationship heats up in and out of the office, and Zac and Fatima receive potentially devastating news about his release.

episodes.name: Enemy of Mine
episodes.overview: Hayden is consumed with finding out how Zac keeps escaping jail time.

episodes.name: Benefit of the Doubt
episodes.overview: Sabrina embarks on a new adventure in her personal life.

episodes.name: Inside and Out
episodes.overview: Logan seems to be hiding something, and Sabrina appears to be involved.

episodes.name: Moving On Up
episodes.overview: Sabrina gets entangled in a situation that could have serious consequences for her.

episodes.name: Make Him Great
episodes.overview: Danni attempts to get answers from Logan regrading his suspicious behavior.

episodes.name: Pain and Suffering
episodes.overview: Andi confronts Gary about his intention to lawyer up against her; Karen's heath is at risk as she comes to terms with her depth of love for Zac.

episodes.name: No Stress
episodes.overview: Andi and Danni get to the bottom of things with respect to Sabrina's whereabouts; Fatima suspects Zac has residual feelings for Karen and confronts him.

episodes.name: The Letter
episodes.overview: Things heat up between Fatima and Deja as Zac plays mediator. Zac agrees to go to Karen’s to put it all on the table so he and Fatima can move forward in peace.

episodes.name: It’s All About Who You Know
episodes.overview: Karen confronts Zac and Aaron with her true feelings once and for all with Lisa’s help. Fatima introduces AndI to her cousin in the hope she can be instrumental with helping Sabrina.

episodes.name: Keep it One Hundred
episodes.overview: Danni meets a new love interest, and Andi looks to have a stalker.

episodes.name: Ego Trip
episodes.overview: Karen adopts a new practice to help her and Zac's situation get better. Danni is put in a very uncomfortable situation with her new guy friend.

episodes.name: Pushed to the Limit
episodes.overview: Danni makes a mistake and asks for Andi's help; Karen regains her independence.

episodes.name: Pursuit For Truth
episodes.overview: Karen’s doubts about Aaron deepen;  Danni continues to juggle her love life.

episodes.name: Discretion if Key
episodes.overview: When a new prosecutor from Andi’s past resurfaces, it creates trouble for Sabrina and Maurice.

episodes.name: Dead To Rights
episodes.overview: Karen learns who the father of her unborn child is; Sabrina and Maurice are against each other.

episodes.name: Backlash
episodes.overview: Fatima sets a plan in motion to get back at Hayden; Zac and Fatima travel into uncomfortable territory with Karen, putting their relationship to the test.

episodes.name: Feeling the Heat
episodes.overview: Maurice reaches out to Calvin and is reassured that all will be well; Zac plans for a talk with karen and Fatima when Andi shows up.

episodes.name: Fair Game
episodes.overview: Zac makes Karen an ofr that she can definitely refuse; Fatima is finally forced to come clean. and she and Karen face off at the townhouse while Andy and Zac are present.

episodes.name: Two Can Play That Game
episodes.overview: Zac is blindsided when Fatima’s friend catches him in a questionable situation; Tamara has Hayden right where she needs him, gathering pertinent information fro Fatima.

episodes.name: Picture Perfect
episodes.overview: Fatima confronts Zac with proof of an inappropriate interaction; Maurice must come up with bail in order to get out of jail.

episodes.name: Looks Are Deceiving
episodes.overview: Fatima’s accusations push Zac over the edge; Danni settles in her decision with Preston; AndI possibly finds her way into becoming a partner.

episodes.name: Friends Are Lovers
episodes.overview: Karen and Andi deal with a matter of betrayal that threatens the sistahood. Fatima leaves Zac for the night to make hard decisions about what her next move should be.

episodes.name: Truth Hurts
episodes.overview: Sabrina makes a surprising discovery while at Danny’s apartment; Fatima puts Zac in his place as they continue to argue over harsh words.

episodes.name: What Goes Around
episodes.overview: When Danni discovers Que’s true identify, she is mortified; Andy’s chances of becoming partner are hindered; Zac’s unexpected visitor causes trouble for him and Fatima.

episodes.name: A Vicious Cycle
episodes.overview: An unforeseen visit from an old friend sparks up questions Fatima has to address; Karen has her doubts about Aaron after seeing him in a different light.

episodes.name: Too Little, Too Late
episodes.overview: Danni's actions have left her in a vulnerable position, while Karen quickly realizes that Aaron is hiding something, and she pays the ultimate price.

episodes.name: Straight No Chaser
episodes.overview: Dannie wallows in self-pity until an encounter with Preston threatens to send her off the deep end.

episodes.name: Full Circle Moments
episodes.overview: Preston shows up for Danni when she needs him most, but it doesn’t seem to extinguish her anger toward him; Fatima sets Tamara straight about compensation for the role she’s been tapped to play.

episodes.name: Fanning the Flames
episodes.overview: Hayden makes Tamara an offer she can’t refuse, but it could change her mission; shocking news evokes a reaction from Zac that Fatima isn’t ready for.

episodes.name: Face the Fire
episodes.overview: As the girls try to learn more about Karen's whereabouts, the reality of losing a friend begins to sink in; Zac and Fatima face a struggle about his devotion.

episodes.name: Better Safe Than Sorry
episodes.overview: Karen’s whereabouts are discovered; Fatima is disturbed by Zac’s concern; Andi and Gary share a moment of complete honesty about where their current relationship status is.

episodes.name: Mending Fences
episodes.overview: Fatima and Zac's relationship is pushed to the limits as Karen's feelings for him start to increase; Gary tries to help Hayden out of an unexpected arrangement; Sabrina and Maurice meet with a lawyer.

episodes.name: Ordinary Pain
episodes.overview: After catching Zac off guard, Fatima questions the status of their relationship; Sabrina devises a strategy to remove Que once and for all.

episodes.name: Uneven Playing Field
episodes.overview: As Hayden and Tamara's relationship grows stronger, Gary still isn't sure about her true intentions; Maurice continues his pursuit to get Que to confess the truth.

episodes.name: True Colors
episodes.overview: Aaron gives Andi an ultimatum after a run-in with Fatima; Maurice makes a rash decision in an effort to help Sabrina, but it could backfire, landing them both in more trouble.

episodes.name: The Aftermath
episodes.overview: Maurice is willing to risk everything to save his friend, as Danni may have made a terrible mistake with Preston; Zac puts his relationship at risk in an effort to assist Karen

episodes.name: No Turning Back
episodes.overview: As tension between Karen and Fatima continues to rise, their dispute goes beyond the point of no return; despite Calvin's advice, Maurice decides to meet with the police.

episodes.name: Daydreams
episodes.overview: Gary gives Hayden a stern warning to be careful with Tamara's mysterious motives; Sabrina learns that Bayo's help with her and Maurice's legal situation has strings attached.

episodes.name: Truth Is
episodes.overview: Karen is aware of the paternity outcome, and the women support her; Que's lies catch up to him, as Zac and Fatima make a sad discovery about his son.

episodes.name: Something New
episodes.overview: Andi, Sabrina, and Danni have dream dates that seem almost too good to be true; Fatima and Zac makes a quick decision for the safety of Michael.

episodes.name: Too Close to Home
episodes.overview: After spending to with Michael, Zac learns he must do whatever it takes to get custody of his son; Preston and Danni continue to not see eye to eye.

episodes.name: Relentless Pursuit
episodes.overview: As Zac and Fatima struggle with the fallout of custodial care, Sabrina and Maurice discover their fate; Karen realizes that the studio damage may lose her, her livelihood.

episodes.name: Taste of Freedom
episodes.overview: Danni avoids a difficult conversation with Preston; Andi, Danni and Sabrina’s triple date at Jordan’s takes an unexpected turn.

episodes.name: From the Blindside
episodes.overview: When Jordan's sister Penelope shows up, Gary and Andi are both put in an uncomfortable situation; with doubts about his son's safety, Zac and Fatima try to track down Healther's whereabouts.

episodes.name: Dear Karma
episodes.overview: Andi dwells on her past with Gary, while Zac and Fatima receive disturbing news about his son; Maurice is drawn to a new, charming man.

episodes.name: The Last Laugh
episodes.overview: Karen reconsiders a new direction for her shop while Zac and Fatima prepare for unfortunate news about his son; Sabrina is determined to reclaim her life.

episodes.name: Lose to Win
episodes.overview: As Gary’s misdeeds collide, Sabrina’s good news will have a negative effect on Maurice; Hayden confronts Fatima concerning Tamara; Michael’s fate is revealed to Zac and Fatima, as Karen makes a life-altering decision.

episodes.name: Beautiful Lies
episodes.overview: After Andi, Fatima and Penelope confront Gary, his true intentions are revealed; Dani deals with Preston’s big news; Zac and Fatima try to work thing s out to get custody of Michael.

episodes.name: New Beginnings
episodes.overview: Danni dismisses Tony's concern about her nightmares, Andi hosts an awkward dinner party, Sabrina gets surprising news about Calvin, and Zac feels helpless as his son's custody case drags on.

episodes.name: Drunk in Love
episodes.overview: Karen stresses over financing her new salon, Fatima gets Danni to reconsider therapy at the ladies' boozy brunch, Sabrina and Rich don't see eye-to-eye, and Gary gets a wake-up call at work.

episodes.name: Grand Openings and Closings
episodes.overview: Karen's salon opening hits a snag, Danni has her first therapy session, Sabrina tries to move past her drunken comments to Rich, and Andi's ties to Gary expose her to scrutiny at work.

episodes.name: Death Becomes Them
episodes.overview: Andi and Sabrina both find themselves competing with workplace rivals, Danni is torn between her friendships with Karen and Fatima, and Penelope makes a shocking discovery about Gary.

episodes.name: Hanging in the Balance
episodes.overview: Maurice explores a new romantic interest, Danni addresses a past trauma in counseling, Sabrina feels the pressure at work and Gary contemplates a violent method to get what he wants.

episodes.name: Pretty Hurts
episodes.overview: The ladies talk about their lives in their thirties at Sabrina's birthday brunch, Fatima keeps a secret from Zac, Gary tests the waters with Tamara, and Pam has a new business venture.

episodes.name: It's Giving Scandal
episodes.overview: A damaging story about Jordan's past not only impacts his campaign but also his relationship with Andi, and Karen decides to proceed with an amniocentesis to prove the baby is Zac's.

episodes.name: Pens and Needles
episodes.overview: Andi is surprised by a big new client, Danni and Sabrina try to turn back the hands of time in each of their relationships, and Karen and Zac's DNA test reveals more than they expected.

episodes.name: Threes a Crowd
episodes.overview: Karen shares unexpected news that makes Zac happy but causes a totally different reaction from Fatima, and one of Gary's plans to sabotage Andi backfires.

episodes.name: The Good Fight
episodes.overview: Sabrina fears for her job after standing up to her boss, Andi's new client drops a bombshell, Maurice's date night goes awry, and Gary explodes when Penelope confronts him about his past.

episodes.name: Gone Girl
episodes.overview: Andi is forced to work with her worst nightmare on a high-profile divorce case, and Karen's issues with Danni and Fatima come to the surface during a group mocktail outing.

episodes.name: Next Level
episodes.overview: Maurice and Grayson have a serious conversation about their future, Karen finally shares her shocking paternity results, and Andi delivers devastating news to Jordan.

episodes.name: Who Can I Run To
episodes.overview: Andi is presented with an offer to help take Gary down once and for all, and Danni and Fatima can't seem to keep Karen's big news to themselves.

episodes.name: All for the D
episodes.overview: Gary's savagery continues as he plants a seed in Jordan's head about Andi, all while screwing Hayden's girl right in their home; when Karen finds out Danni is telling her business, the tension between the women grows.

episodes.name: Love Means Never Having to Say You're Sorry
episodes.overview: Andi and Hayden make a shocking discovery on the Marie-Willis case; Danni seeks advice on how to best apologize to Tony.

episodes.name: Close To You
episodes.overview: Sabrina attempts to plan a baby shower for Karen and Danni struggles to understand the dynamic between Tiffany and Tony; meanwhile, Jordan finds himself in harm's way.

episodes.name: Taste of Freedom
episodes.overview: Gary reaches his limit with Andi so he charges her with an ultimatum, either she marries him, or Jordan pays the price; Fatima's intuition about Hayden and Marie Willis confirmed after seeing them together.

episodes.name: Where Do Broken Hearts Go?
episodes.overview: Gary forces Andi's hand, and she makes a heartbreaking decision. Karen finds solace with Danni and with Zac. Danni attempts to defend her behaviour around Tony's kids. Sabrina meets someone new who's interested in her personal life.

episodes.name: It Takes A Village
episodes.overview: Karen's baby shower is full of fun and healing until Gary shows up with a shocking announcement; Damany presents Sabrina with a surprising opportunity.

episodes.name: Beautiful Liar
episodes.overview: Gary's presence and announcement at the baby shower shakes up Andi's friends; she now must put on a brave face and lie to everyone about saying yes to Gary's marriage proposal; Hayden's tryst is finally exposed to not only his co-workers.

episodes.name: Penultimate
episodes.overview: Jordan and Fatima engage in ugly battles with Gary on Andi's behalf; Zac and Aaron bond over baby furniture; Karen and Pam make peace; Danni has a therapy session hoping to figure out her love life.

episodes.name: Had It Coming
episodes.overview: Andi's career is completely changed but her life  into turmoil when someone's life is at stake. Meanwhile, Sabrina's true desires come true.

episodes.name: Dead Man Walking
episodes.overview: Andi, along with the rest of her close-knit sister circle and even a few enemies, all have some explaining to do amid the fallout of Gary's brutal stabbing.

episodes.name: Up Close & Personal
episodes.overview: Andi struggles to deal with the fallout post Gary's stabbing when all her friends are interrogated by the FBI for their possible role in hurting Gary; Andi makes a confession to her friends.

episodes.name: Showin' Out
episodes.overview: Andi's attempt to see Gary is stopped by an indignant Hudson. Tony's surprise for Danni leads to a blow-up between them at work. Robin gives Fatima the worst boss she can imagine. An old rival returns to the bank and accuses Sabrina and Maurice of getting her fired; which brings out a new side of Sabrina. A disgruntled customer threatens Karen's salon.
